blogPost.excerpt: Taloflow is the fastest way to find the best dev and cloud tools for your use case. We provide expert buying advice and tailored analysis to match your requirements with the best solution every time.
blogPost.body: Taloflow is the fastest way to find the best dev and cloud tools for your use case. We provide expert buying advice and tailored analysis to match your requirements with the best solution every time.
blogPost.title: Taloflow - Find the best dev and cloud tools for your use case
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Taloflow是为您的使用案例寻找最佳开发和云工具的最快方法。我们提供专业的购买建议和量身定制的分析，每次都能为您提供符合您需求的最佳解决方案。
localize.tagline: 为您的用例找到最佳的开发和云工具。

localize.description: Taloflow是爲您的使用案例尋找最佳開發和雲工具的最快方法。我們提供專業的購買建議和量身定製的分析，每次都能爲您提供符合您需求的最佳解決方案。
localize.tagline: 爲您的用例找到最佳的開發和雲工具。

previous.excerpt: Our analytics platform helps e-commerce businesses manage and grow their brands with intuitive tools. We're an all-in-one analytics hub that provides users with customizable dashboards, informative business metrics, and insights specific to their business.
previous.title: Blocklight Analytics - Tools for E-Commerce Business Owners

localize.description: 我们的分析平台通过直观的工具帮助电商企业管理和发展品牌。我们是一个一体化的分析中心，为用户提供可定制的仪表盘、信息丰富的业务指标和针对其业务的见解。
localize.tagline: 电子商务企业主的工具

localize.description: 我們的分析平臺通過直觀的工具幫助電商企業管理和發展品牌。我們是一個一體化的分析中心，爲用戶提供可定製的儀表盤、信息豐富的業務指標和針對其業務的見解。
localize.tagline: 電子商務企業主的工具

next.excerpt: Swifter is an AI-based email subject-line generator (using GPT-3). Swifter supports 5 types of email (welcome, abandoned cart, discount, pain-points, goal events) and 3 tones (friendly, bold, professional) and works for both B2B and B2C emails.
next.title: Swifter - Email subject line generator for B2B & B2C, built with GPT-3

localize.description: Swifter是一款基于AI的邮件主题行生成器（使用GPT-3）。Swifter支持5种邮件类型（欢迎、放弃购物车、折扣、痛点、目标事件）和3种色调（友好、粗体、专业），适用于B2B和B2C邮件。
localize.tagline: 基于GPT-3的B2B和B2C邮件主题行生成器。

localize.description: Swifter是一款基於AI的郵件主題行生成器（使用GPT-3）。Swifter支持5種郵件類型（歡迎、放棄購物車、折扣、痛點、目標事件）和3種色調（友好、粗體、專業），適用於B2B和B2C郵件。
localize.tagline: 基於GPT-3的B2B和B2C郵件主題行生成器。
